const TEST_EXTENSION = 'xml'

Detailed Description

Main TestSuite class. This class reads the configuration file(s) of the requested test batch (provided in the GET request with argument name 'mod') and builds the internal test structure of objects, all set up and ready to go. The run method starts the test.
Author:
Bas van Gaalen
Since:
1.0

TestSuite.run (  ) 

Run the tests. Calls the run method in the TestModule classes as defined in this TestSuite.
